data.title: Facts, Rumors and the latest Gossip.
data.meta_description: Answers to your questions about Shuji Kataoka's life, age, relationships, sexual orientation, drug usage, net worth and the latest gossip!
data.text:
Who is Shuji Kataoka? Biography, gossip, facts?

Shuji Kataoka aka Yasui Shchi is Japanese Pink film director and screenwriter. He was born in Hokkaido on November 23 1950. He studied at Kanto Gakuin University but dropped out before graduation in order to work at producer-director Kan Mukai's Shishi Productions. At Shishi he worked under Mukai and Yjir Takita. Kataoka's first pink film Yokoku Bk: Yaru! Sasu! was released in 1983. Since then he has made many action pink films and has gone on to direct mainstream movies and V-Cinema.

When is Shuji Kataoka's birthday?

Shuji Kataoka was born on the 23rd of November 1950, which was a Thursday. Shuji Kataoka will be turning 74 in only 94 days from today.

How old is Shuji Kataoka?

Shuji Kataoka is 73 years old. To be more precise (and nerdy), the current age as of right now is 26674 days or (even more geeky) 640176 hours. That's a lot of hours!

What is Shuji Kataoka's zodiac sign and horoscope?

Shuji Kataoka's zodiac sign is Sagittarius.

The ruling planet of Sagittarius is Jupitor. Therefore, lucky days are Thursdays and lucky numbers are: 3, 12, 21 and 30. Violet, Purple, Red and Pink are Shuji Kataoka's lucky colors. Typical positive character traits of Sagittarius include: Generosity, Altruism, Candour and Fearlessness. Negative character traits could be: Overconfidence, Bluntness, Brashness and Inconsistency.
